headline: Illicit Cigarettes in European Union at Highest Level Since 2015, KPMG Study Shows
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., June 11, 2025--Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE: PM) today issues an urgent call for effective policymaking to counter the growing threat of illicit trade in the EU. In 2024, 38.9 billion illicit cigarettes were consumed in the region—the highest level since 2015—accounting for 9.2% of total cigarette consumption, with governments losing as much as €14.9 billion in tax revenues at a time when many countries face intense economic pressures.

headline: 2 Mooning  Stocks Worth Your Attention and 1 to Be Wary Of
